snippet.title: Hoi Amiga game - longplay
snippet.description:
Hoi is a Commodore Amiga game, internationally published on two 3.5 inch diskettes in the summer of 1992. The game was created by Reinier van Vliet (programming), Ramon Braumuller (music) and Metin Seven (graphics).

Note: the acceleration in the psychedelic finale (level 5) is incorrect, due to the used emulator. A correct recording of that level is also available in this YouTube channel.

Recording by Ironclaw for recordedamigagames.org . Many thanks!

The game's box featured the first-ever epilepsy warning for a computer game, because of the over-the-top psychedelic finale.

Download the game for free here:
https://archive.org/search.php?query=creator%3A%22Team+Hoi%22

Metin's portfolio:
https://metinseven.nl
